TITLE: Vice Cheat Sheet
TEXT: A single-page pdf for most of the things that needed to be cut and drilled to make a vice. This was made for a "Manufacturing Fundamentals" course I took.This was made using GIMP and Inkscape. It was time consuming to flip through the pictures of the instructions on my phone and it was likely similarily inconvenient for my classmates; so I took my previous manager's advice and put my documentation skills to use. The result was a convenient document that my classmates were thrilled to get. This should make things more convenient for future students as well.

TITLE: Flex Sampler Manual
TEXT: A pdf detailing the how to use an application I made in college and continued to use through the years. Said application gives guidance to web developers for laying out elements.

TITLE: Card Simulator Manual
TEXT: A pdf detailing the how to use an application that lets you generate a virtual deck of cards using plain text.

TITLE: What is a Fixed Mindset?
TEXT: An image that details what a fixed mindset is (lack of faith in one's ability to change positively) and how to fix it (challenge yourself). This was the end result of a research project. If I revisit this project, I might try to make a simplifed version that is functionally closer to the infographics one might see on LinkedIn.

TITLE: College Cheatsheets
TEXT: In college, one of my study methods was to create cheat sheets (alongside using Flash Cards, of course). These were fine to use during tests as the vast-majority were open-book. Fellow students were quite pleased for me to share these with them. Here are some of them:
